name: Space Escape! (itch) (Conner A.)
description:
Join Reggie as he finds his space station under attack from aliens and must escape to his ship!

Additions to the game are as follows

-A script creating rotation of objects as seen in level 3 used from the solar planet project provided by MSU

-2 unique levels including a space themed level where if you fall you will die

-An electric damaging floor in level 2
